# ::id 1543
# ::snt PH : So , to wrap up , I 'd love to throw it back to Marshall McLuhan , who , 40 , was dealing with audiences that were going through just as much change , and I think that today traditional Hollywood , and the writers are framing this perhaps in the way that it was being framed before .

# ::alignments 0-1|0.0 2-3|0 6-7|0.1.2 8-9|0.1.1 9-10|0.1 10-11|0.1.0.2.0 15-16|0.1.0.2 17-18|0.1.0.0 18-19|0.1.0.0.0 19-20|0.1.0.0.0.0 20-21|0.1.0.0.0.0.0.0 21-22|0.1.0.0.0.0.0 22-23|0.1.0.0.0.0.1.0 23-24|0.1.0.0.0.0.1 27-28|0.1.0.0.0.0.1.1 30-31|0.1.0.0.0.0.1.1.0 34-35|0.1.0.0.0.1 36-37|0.1.0 37-38|0.1.0.1.0 40-41|0.1.0.1 
(v2 / focus-01
    :frequency (v1 / sometimes)
    :ARG1 (v5 / and
        :op2 (v17 / and
            :op1 (v8 / possible-01
                :ARG1 (v9 / help-01
                    :ARG1 (v10 / magnify-01
                        :ARG1 (v12 / intangible
                            :mod (v11 / this))
                        :ARG1 (v13 / way
                            :quant 3
                            :location v12
                            :topic (v14 / protagonist
                                :part-of (v15 / story))))
                    :location (v16 / audience)))
            :op2 (v19 / storyteller
                :mod (v18 / also))
            :mod (v7 / context
                :mod (v6 / dignified)))
        :ARG1-of (v4 / beautiful-02)
        :mod (v3 / hero)))

# ::id 1998
# ::snt And that 's the power of storytelling .
# ::alignments 0-1|0 4-5|0.0 6-7|0.0.0 
(v1 / and
    :op2 (v2 / power
        :poss (v3 / story)))

# ::id 1999
# ::snt Can geographic information make you healthy ?
# ::alignments 0-1|0 1-2|0.0.0.0 2-3|0.0.0 3-4|0.0 4-5|0.0.1.0 5-6|0.0.1 6-7|0.1 
(v1 / possible-01
    :ARG1 (v4 / make-02
        :ARG0 (v3 / information
            :mod (v2 / geography))
        :ARG1 (v6 / health
            :domain (v5 / you)))
    :mode interrogative)
